Providing client support is the core duty of the Business Analyst. Support can also include off-site support and communication with clients, either via meetings, conference calls, remote system support etc. Such communication is usually not limited to just end-users but stakeholders as well, and it is critical for the team to always maintain professionalism when communicating with the client, respecting each personnel from CEOs to cashiers.

Basic duties include:

Provide system software support to client, which includes configuration of the application, whether off site or on site
Provide business and system support/advice for both internal and external clients
Testing and Troubleshooting of all applications released by the development team, ensuring quality testing for release to clients
Provide system support and testing with R&D team when required
Preparing relevant documentations for both internal and external clients.
Provide training to both internal and external clients.
Provide support to sales team with inquiries and demos both online and onsite.
Qualifications/Education and Experience Required:

Diploma / Degree in Hospitality Management.
Prior experience using and/or managing Point-of-Sales systems will be advantageous
Eloquent in English
Proficient to communicate in Mandarin in lieu of China-based clients
Organized and have proficient documentation skills
Willing and able to travel at short notice
Must have excellent client handling skills including oral, written, and interpersonal communication skills
Preferably able to start work within short notice. Immediately available profiles will be highly ranked
